message: Great to reduce the bulk of hanging hoodies but they do slide off the hanger if moved too often.
They are Exactly as described/pictured
Item shipped quickly and looks as it’s shown.
Works well with hoodies and long nightdresses

Work and look as advertised, sturdier than I expected. The main issue is how slippery the hangers are, surprisingly thinner, lighter hoodies seem to have a hard time staying on compared to heavier ones. I'll probably add some sort of grip tape, but it would be nice if it came with something like that

This did not work for me, but would probably work for someone who had more height on their closet bar. Disappointed I could not make these work for me, but happy with the seller. Item as described, I just didn’t take into account what my space would allow for.

I can see how this item would work in some situations, but for my hoodies in my closet, I couldn't seem to get the hooks in any figuration that the hoodies would stay on. The hooks are sturdy, though, and I am hopeful I can repurpose them.

Editing to add: after posting this review, customer service reached out and was super helpful. I'd definitely shop this store again.
Sold exactly as advertised. Makes grabbing a hoodie out of the closet and putting them back up much more convenient.
Amazing idea and so glad I can get out closer more organized with all these hoodies we have!
Great and practical item, organized my hoodies
Bought for a Xmas gift.
They work better than I expected!
These are fantastic for hoodies and get rid of the hanger bumps!
My daughter is very happy! She’s glad she doesn’t have to worry about stretching out the necks on her hoodies.
Great quality and great organization!
This is a very unique item. Saves the shoulders of your hoodies and shelf space in the closet.

These are quite brilliant. I have a teenager who apparently has no idea how to use a hanger. Since he has about 600 hoodies (or so it seems), his closet and room were always a mess. Miraculously, he has figures out how to hang things with these. Will be ordering more!
The sweatshirt design is sick I’m in love with the blue gradient.  I hope they release more designs/colors in the future.
The hangars are simple and easy to use. It’s very quick to put on and off the hoody, and they are stable/sturdy. Cool innovative product my guy, you designed these well.
Hoodies slip right off of these. I had to put a hanger grip on to keep from clothes falling off the hook. If these were included, easy five stars. But without, they don’t really work.
Very interesting concept to hang hoodies. Works well.
Delivered as advertised. Great price.
Did not need customer service
Seems to do the job it’s intended for! Excited to get into cooler weather to really put them to the test. Not wearing many hoodies in the southern heat yet!

Happy!
On time. Great quality
Purchased to help my nephew organize his hoodies!

Great idea but didn't work for our purposes - causes sweatshirts and jackets to hang lower than traditional hangers and if you have a split hanging closet (one bar over another), advise ensuring you have a bit higher ceilings to accommodate the few inches of needed length.
These are amazing and I will be purchasing more!
Packed economically, work great, definitely sturdy!
One out of 5 of my hoodies would stay on these things. I would not buy again, though they were sturdy and well made, the product just didn’t do as advertised.
These things are awesome.  The little clip holding them to the rod is great.  Totally changes how I store hoodies.
As expected and quick shipping
Arrived quickly and in perfect condition! Thank you!
Super! Works great!
Perfect for hanging up my ever growing amount of hoodies
These are awesome, it makes it so much easier to put away and grab hoodies.
Very helpful in my closet
It arrived quickly and works wonders! It’s exactly as pictured and makes hanging up hoodies a lot easier so it makes finishing laundry so much easier! Love it!:)
These are great for hanging my hoodies! The price was steep, but they work.

I bought these for my wife, who has amassed quite the collection of hoodies. These clever, well-made hooks look great and provide her with an easy way to hang her hoodie wardrobe without taking up space and traditional hangers in the closet. These exceeded my expectations. Thank you!
Great!
Good quality. Helped organize son's room - exceeded expectations.

The quality and descritpion was spot-on and met my expectations, however the amount of hoodies my grandson and son have does not allow them to hang them in their closets.  They are back to folding them and piling them up.  Disappointed.

The quality and descritpion was spot-on and met my expectations, however the amount of hoodies my grandson and son have does not allow them to hang them in their closets.  They are back to folding them and piling them up.  Disappointed.

It's the little things in life that matter!  This custom necklace was well worth the wait.  The detail was amazing, and I love it! 5 stars and more! 
Side note: Praying for peace in the Ukraine. ❤️
These work great to hang hoodies! They are curved so there’s no mark left from hanging. Genius design!
Does exactly as advertised, easy to use, decent quality. Does make your hoodies hang lower so if you store shoes under, it could be a problem. Glad that I bought them!
Fast shipping and minimal packaging
A cool little product that helped me organize my coat closet.
Love these..  (who knew i had so many hoodies)!!!
I love these! I have a really tiny coat closet and they save so much space
Nice product! Only thing I wish is that the plastic had a grip on it to better prevent the hood from falling off.
Cool invention works as advertised.
I've ordered twice and been pleased both times. Both sets are the same quality and work very well with no slippage. May buy even more.
Just as described. Came very quickly!
Brilliant! excellent communication and customer service. Highly recommended! this is 2nd time I bought hoodie from Nick as the hoodie is that good, quality wise and colour wise.
Brilliant! excellent communication and customer service. Highly recommended! I love the hoodie enough to buy another one.
We love these!
Great product! Bought these for my son, and he loves them.

Great idea & well executed. Makes it easier for teens to keep their Hoosier off the floor. Just be aware that hoodies will hang quite a bit lower that on a normal hanger, which could cause them to interfere with a shelf or lower clothes bar below or pool onto the floor. That in mind, very handy!
Injection molded for a durable hanger. Top notch customer service. Thanks!
What an amazing product. Thank-you 🥰
They do what they say they will, what more can you ask :)

Very nice  works well
Thank you
Well made and created extra space in my closet! Ordering more for myself and my dog’s hoodies.
Great hanger for hoodies! We have so many and these are great! Thank you!
Great concept but the hoodies slip off the hooks
Works exactly like I thought it would.
I love these babies. In a way I wish there was also a metallic version but they work so great! Genius
Great addition to an organized closet. Fast delivery
Exactly as pictured, would buy again
These hooks are so great and incredibly smart in any closet.
Great organization for my son’s hoodies
They definitely work! But I have found that on my HEAVY weight hoodies, I have to make sure the hood is all the way on the hanger or else it will fall. I still would buy them again!
They really work as they claim!!!
Cool concept. Part that holds hoodie is slick.
Works great!
Perfect gift for my hubby. It’s so comfy for hanging out on a chilly day. He’s worn it for the last 3 days… might be time to snag it from him so I can toss it in the laundry. 🤪
Fantastic product. So simple, such a closet-changing device.
Great quality!! Fits perfectly. Vibrant nice colors!! Really love it!! Thanks a ton! :)
This was a huge hit with my son.
it ispractical in my car
Works exactly as advertised. Good quality. I’m probably going to buy more!
Can't say how it works but the teens who received them are happy!
Great seller! is a FANTASTIC product!!
Love my Venalli sweatshirt!  Great quality item and wonderful customer service!  Thank you!
Very helpful looks nice and even works on small closet bars
so damn ingenious. This is my second order of these.
These are great! Good quality and the shipping was quick as well. Ordering more!
Love it.  Maybe now son will be more organized.  I did end up using the clips to hold because it held the hangers more securely since they just yank it off the hanger.
This company is incredible to work with!  Thank you Venalli for great customer service, quality and reliability!!
Absolutely love it! High quality and gorgeous colors.
Perfect to hang all of my teen’s hoodies (& save the other hangers from breakage)
Great communication, especially with expected shipping dates. Right on time!
Our family celebrates Christmas with a “guessum” present, I love buying useful things that are hard to figure out at first glance - this fit the bill perfectly.

I love these hangers! They save a decent amount of space.  The only downside is they can be finicky if your closet doesn't have standard clothing rods. My closet has a raised lip attached to a shelf instead of a clothing rod so these hangers fall off easily. Im not able to use the provided fasteners
Quick shipment! Item is amazing!
Shipped really quick and works perfectly! Holds up the hoodies and fits in my closet great!

These are super cool and sturdy, very impressed. I appreciate the card inside the package that explains how/when to use the little clip attachments. Delivery was prompt - for reference I ordered on Oct 27, they shipped the next day, and arrived Nov 1. They're a gift for my hoodie-obsessed brother so I haven't tried them out but seem like they'll be just what he needs to get his hoodies off the floor!!
Fast shipping… these hangers are great!!
Will be great for my son to hang all his hoodies.  Works well and heavy hoodies are staying up on the hook
These hooks work great and matches the description.
Great product and fast delivery
I purchased these for the second time. Because they're great. No more stretched necks or shoulder spikes from putting hoodies on a regular hanger. I like them very much.
my hoodies fall off instantly

Bought these during the summer so only had a couple of hoodies in the closet but with cooler weather approaching, there will be more hoodies in my closet and these hold them so well, I may have to order more!
Works great, if you have lots of hoodies and need to consolidate space in your closet, get these!
Great product for my son's tiny dorm room closet!  Thank you!
Very cool item. Works better than I thought it would
Both my son and I are grateful for these. They work well with his hoodies. It is a little on the pricey side, but great otherwise.
These hooks are great and definitely work in my small closet.
Eh, Came with an irrating thing to make it stay on the closet bar. Don.t waste money.
These are going to be great for my college kids!
Arrived on time exactly as described. These hangers work perfectly and I could not be happier!
I loved these for so much, I ordered them a second time!  Perfectly designed for hoodies, and my son took them to college with him.
I love the idea, but the plastic is almost too slippery for the hood to stay on.  Needs grips
Perfect for those that have many many hoodies.  Like me.  :)
It’s a bad product. The hood hook isn’t big enough. The balance is off. The hoodies fall off. A real sad trombone.
We have a lot of hoodies and these work nice.  Thanks.
These are amazing!
Exactly as described, each can hold 3-4 hoodies each
Very quick delivery.
I’d give it 5 stars all the way around instead of 4 overall - EXCEPT!!!  I ordered pink hooks and I got black ones.

I'm a repeat customer and quality of these continues to be great. Glad to see they took the suggestions in the earlier reviews to add some brief instructions for folks on how to put the small part in. Very quick shipping!
Purse hook works great, bright color easy to find in my purse!
Great quality. I plan on ordering a few more
A little expensive but a great idea (if my son will actually use them).   I purchased for a dorm room where space is at a premium.

These are so awesome! My teenager has a habit of break regular hangers when getting their hoodies off of them, so I wanted to try these out. Only bought a set of 5, but I will definitely be buying more when it gets closer to winter. Great quality and such a unique design, these are just perfect!
Easy to use and makes storing our hoodies so much easier now.
Completely helps my son's closet. Thank you!
Smart item, came just as expected promptly.

Very good quality and definitely worth the money!!
This company is wonderful to deal with. I would purchase stuff from them anytime.
So clever, now do one for safely storing old tee shirts without stretching them out!
They work well but can get cramped
These are amazing. They are perfect to organize my daughter's closet.
My son has so many hoodies.  These work out great!!!!
My daughter loves these!! They are great for organizing her hoodies!
My son uses them for his hoodies and jeans, and is amazed how nice his cloths look when they're not full of wrinkles.
I love these hangers for my hoodies and coats with hoods! They save room and are much easier to get stuff off and on than a regular hanger.
These hoodie hangers are really cool and work great!
Why it took so long for me to find, I'll never know
So great for easily hanging up sweatshirts!
My grandson loves these hangers and has found multiple uses for them in his room!
More durable than they look and hold some of my heaviest hoodies.
Fascinating and innovative product, not the sturdiest for my thickest hoodies, but so far nothing has fallen off the hooks!

I first bought these for my son who owns 20+ hoodies. 

Worked so well, I bought a set for myself!

They hang your hoodie easily in the closet and you can see which is which.
The hooks work great. the customer service was excellent and very responsive. I might have to buy more!
Well made, smaller than anticipated but sized well for purpose.  Works best if you only have one close bar in closet as the extra space needed to hang by hood interferes with ground or lower bar.
Very cool and easy to use--
Super useful! Definitely a niche product but our family wardrobe is like 80% hoodies so totally practical for us! And great for hooded jackets, hats, etc. too.
Great product!!
Bit smaller than I had imagined but they work great. I have reclaimed the chair in my office that had served as hoody hanging area.
These work great! Very convenient and met my expectations.
These hangers are great! Solid quality and definitely freed up a lot of space in our coat closet. Shipping took a bit but it was worth it.
Met my expectations of quality and description
Arrived quickly and very handy.

Quick shipment…carry it in my little crossbody purse. Have used it when going out to eat - works well. 
Item is as described and meets my expectations! Thanks!
Love these!  Clever design, work perfectly.  Thanks!
Worked just like they are supposed to.
Very cool item!
Such a smart product. Some hoodies will slide off, but it’s a great idea overall!
They are smaller than I pictured but still work great! Hopefully this helps my teen’s room stay neater! Quick shipping too.
Exactly what I ordered, I just wish there was some texturing on the part that the hood touches, my hoodies slip off sometimes. But pretty perfect otherwise!
Great product!! Something you didn’t know you needed. No more points coming out of my hoodies ❤️
Exactly as described. Excellent quality. Will order again!
One of the gifts my grandson asked for! Hope he loves it!
Great item! Works as advertised!
great and fast shipping. Good quality
I got them for my handicapped Son, still working with him to understand.  So going thru a learning curve.

Quality is very nice. I think it would be useful to have some sort of direction for what to do with the smaller pieces, had to come back and look at the listing to make sure I understood what I was meant to do with that piece. Seems to work really nicely to store my hoodies!
simple design, discreet and travel friendly!
Very cool product for the hoodie lover. I wish it came with instructions of some sort because I’m giving it as a gift and without explanation they won’t know what it is. Otherwise, great!

It all looks great! My brother is a big hoodie wearer, despite us living in Georgia with the horrible heat, so when I saw there were hangers specifically designed to hold hoodies- I jumped at the opportunity to snag some for him for Christmas. I think he will love them!
This isn’t as solid as I thought but still worked with what I needed. The price is more than what I think it should be. Other than that I’m satisfied.
Exactly as expected
Exactly as expected
Perfect for getting stuff off the floor, banister, chairs, etc... when you're feeling super lazy! Well made, great product!
These do the job. They will be super helpful.
Received the Venalli Hook hoodie hangers, and not only do they look cool they work amazingly! Very secure on the hanging rod, and very securely hold my heavy hoodie sweatshirts. Highly recommend!
These are awesome! Thank you so much!

Does not work how I expected it to 
Already broke one 😢
Love it, will be purchasing more as gifts.
this is perfect! I use it for my son's towels, my hoodies, and my bathrobe!
These work great, just like it shows! Love these!
Product is great! Frees up some space and easy to grab hoodies. Would have liked to have received a purchase confirmation email or notification of shipping but didn’t. Timely shipping. Really happy!
We’ll it’s not built for bag packs. Very disappointed since I bought it with the understanding that it would hold my nursing bag off the floor. I tried super glueing it but that didn’t work

I really thought that this was a unique and useful idea. Unfortunately, when I received the items I could immediately tell that they were 3D printed. That in itself is not a bad thing but some of my items were warped. It looks like they were printed and then quickly banded together for shipping. The rubber bands left indentations in each hanger. I love the concept and I am still using the hangers. I do wish they were a bit sturdier. When I first ordered I contacted the company asking for a certain color. They did send the item in the color I wanted and I appreciate the customer service. If they keep improving the concept I would order again. Overall not a bad product.
Sturdier than I was expecting. Can’t wait to see them in action!
These are awesome. If you have a hoodie aficionado in your house, these are game changing.
I had previously order 3 hangers & liked them so much I order 3 more to share with family & friends.  I really like this item.  Thanks to a great seller

I got these for my young boys room because they struggled with putting their hoodies on hangers. They work really well!  I'm slightly worried they'll break them easily by pulling down when taking the hoody off the hook, but that's a learning thing. Overall, I'm pleased!
Just as shown/described. I like that this hook has a rubber pad for the table, and the hook seems sturdy. Very pleased, thanks!
Bought these as a gift for my younger brother. He says it's changed his closet. Will purchase more in the future.
I haven't received the item.

As described. Three stars is for seller communication. I had to contact after a week to see what was going on, then again a week later to see if it was ever going to ship. I understand delays, but was unhappy there was no proactive communication.
It didn’t come with instructions so I was a bit confused on how the 2 different pieces connected but I figured it out quickly. My husband loves this addition to his closet side!
Very happy with the hook!  As described & exactly what I wanted!
These work great and freed up a lot of space. I ordered more right away for all my family's hoodies and jackets.
Perfect and exactly as it describes!
These have helped tame my messy 12 year old son’s closet!
I waited until I tried it a few times before reviewing it. My purse weighs about 10-14 lbs (depending) and this handy purse holder held it like a champ.
Good quality, arrived as described, and we're enjoying using them.

Game changer! These hooks are genius, especially if you have a teenager who is lousy at hanging up their hoodies -- it's tough for them to complain when these hooks make it SO easy. One thing to make a note of is, be sure you measure the hanging length of the item you're using these hooks with because it will likely hang down longer than if the same item were on a hanger -- initially our hook-hung hoodies are dragging on the floor a bit but we moved the hang bar up two notches and all is well.
Easy to use.  Great quality.  Sturdy. Exactly as it was advertised.
Very clever and handy.  Very happy we tried this product.  And orange is a great color.
These look like hoodies would just fall off but I’m glad I took a chance… hoodies don’t end up on the closet floor ever!
So great! Thank you!
A great problem solver for all of my son’s sweatshirts.
Very handy! My teenager loves these.
Exactly as described. Excited to put them to use.
Great product! My husband loves it!
Perfect solution to hang hoodies neatly.
Great item — so useful!   Love these!
Thank you
Just what my granddaughter needed for her extensive collection of hoodies. Saves space and she loves them.
Really well made, and the fasteners are a thoughtful toucch
These are amazing and really cut down the amount of room all my hoodies take up in my closet. I will definitely be a returning customer and be ordering more.
Works as described. Thank you.
These hangers are fantastic and very space-saving. Work well and light weight. 10/10 would recommend.
This is so helpful. Thank you!
Works perfectly, saw this on a must have list and it was perfect for my kids closets.

This does work as described, including a very clever mechanism for making sure the hook does not slip from the rod.  I have some concerns about the weight of the item, as I am uncertain it is thick enough to hold heavier weight hoodies for an extended period.  Overall, however, at this time, I do like these hangers.

This item was as described, but when it arrived on a hot summer day, the little rubber sticker that was supposed to grip the shelf slid off in the heat.  I put it back, but I had to do that multiple times.  I will probably have to restick it with my own adhesive.  It also seems to be the wrong size to hook onto any table or shelf I own.  Overall, would not buy again.
Used this today, for the first time. Love it! Strong, lightweight, bright red and super handy!
Such a smart design. Solves one of life’s annoying little problems very elegantly.
Good quality and a very practical solution to an organizational headache. My hoodies are all hanging up now. Couldn't ask for more.
Exactly as described - wish they made a larger size for my husband's hoodies, but these work well otherwise.

Not only is this product fantastic, but when I accidentally shipped it to the wrong address and it got returned to seller, they sent it over to the new address right away. No hassle, no fuss. Incredible service and product!
Very nice, easy to use!
Great idea, but these did not work on our square rods and the backs would snap off
These are great! The only thing that would make them better would be a grippy surface so the hoodies don’t slip.
Purchased as a gift, I know it will be appreciated.
Love this purse hook, perfect for holding my bag at restaurants.
Great products!
Great Product for a family with a hundred hoodies!
These hooks work great for my autistic daughter that loves hoodies! So easy for her to use!
Shipped quickly, great idea, hopefully it’ll help to keep hoodies off the floor!
These hangers work very well.
These coasters are such a cool conversation starter! Not only are they fun to mix-and-match around, but they’re durable and great quality!! We will definitely be stocking up on more soon
Fast shipping and great product! So simple to use that I hope my family can figure this one out as using coat hangers was lost on them. Thank you!!!!
Great quality and shipped quickly!
Great quality and shipped quickly!
Excellent product, first rate customer service

These hooks are awesome! Great product to organize hoodies and love that they actually stay on the hook without sliding off. The seller was quick to respond to a question I had and I received the hooks just a few days after placing the order.
These hoodies hangers came quicker than expected. They are made very well and are absolutely perfect for what we need.

I sure hope you are getting a patent on this design as I haven't seen it elsewhere.  Brilliant and I love it.  Concerned how long it will last as they don't seem as sturdy as I thought they would be - but so far so good and what a great idea!!
design is excellent, printing material isn't the strongest.

We are a hoodie household. I think everyone in this house has at least 6 or 7 hoodies! And prime hoodie hanging spots get overloaded regularly. These hooks are a fantastic solution to our problem. (In my picture i put them on the rod in an alternating pattern because I’m going to end up with 20 hoodies and thought it might save space, not sure if it matters but I love these hooks.)

These are a great addition for my teenage kids closet. They have so many sweatshirts that used to be strewn about on the floor instead of hanging in the closet. These hangers make it easy for them to actually hang up their sweatshirts! The hangers are strong and well made.
Very clever and works great!  Shipped on time and would definitely order again.  Great product!
The hooks fell off the rod
Wow, these Hoodie Hangers work perfect.  Using some of them for stocking stuffers.

Great product! Keeps hoodies organized and close at hand to grab and go. Great solution for all my zip front hoodies that always seem to fall off hangers...The Hoodie Hanger is a much easier way to get them to hang up and stay put!

I'm obsessed with these hoodie hangers!! I have a really small closet, but I find these hangers are a great way to save space! They also make it super easy to throw your hoodie up in a rush or grab it on the go. I will definitely be buying more, and giving these as gifts to family and friends this holiday season.
